tips.tip: Track your expenses regularly to know where your money goes.
Save a small amount each week to build an emergency fund.
Create a monthly budget and stick to it.
Avoid borrowing money for non-essential items.
Plan for unexpected expenses before they happen.
Compare prices before buying to get the best value.
Invest in well-researched stocks or safe assets.
Pay bills on time to avoid late fees and interest.
Keep track of your savings and financial goals.
Limit impulse purchases to stay within your budget.
Set realistic financial goals for short-term and long-term.
Review your financial plan regularly and adjust if needed.
